

.. _file_necsim_neutral_analytical.cpp:

File neutral_analytical.cpp
===========================



Contains a set of functions associated with providing analytical solutions for neutral models in ecology. 


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none

----------------------------------------------
